aspecttable.name: BN-1989
aspecttable.reference: As described in the October 1989 Burlington Northern Railroad Southern Region, Debraska Division Timetable #2. In effect at 0001 Continental Mountain Time, Sunday October 29, 1989.

aspect.name: Advance Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to stop at second signal

aspect.name: Approach Diverging
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to advance on diverging route at the next signal at prescribed speed through turnout.

aspect.name: Approach Medium
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to pass next signal not exceeding 35 MPH.

aspect.name: Approach Restricting
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to pass next signal at restricted speed.

aspect.name: Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed prepared to stop at next signal, trains exceeding 35 MPH immediately reduce to that speed.

aspect.name: Diverging Clear
aspect.indication: Proceed on diverging route not exceeding prescribed speed through turnout.

aspect.name: Diverging Approach Medium
aspect.indication: Proceed on diverging route not exceeding prescribed speed through turnout prepared to pass next signal not exceeding 35 MPH.

aspect.name: Diverging Approach
aspect.indication: Proceed on diverging route not exceeding prescribed speed through turnout prepared to stop at next signal, trains exceeding 35 MPH immediately reduce to that speed.
